document.id: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Governing Board Res. No. 2022-
document.heading: REVISION OF THE LAC COURTE OREILLES BAND OF LAKE SUPERIOR CHIPPEWA INDIANS GAMING ENTERPRISES HOLIDAY PAY POLICY PAP.9.6.080

recital.text: the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians is a federally recognized Indian tribe ("Tribe") organized pursuant to the provisions of the Indian Reorganization Act of 1934, 25 U.S.C. ยง5101, et seq.; and,

the Tribal Governing Board serves as the governing body of Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians pursuant to Article III, ยง 1 of the Amended Constitution and Bylaws of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians;

the Tribal Governing Board pursuant to Article V, Section 1(n) of the Amended Constitution and Bylaws of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians shall "regulate, by the enactment of ordinances, the conduct of business within the territory of the band" and Article V, Section 1(h) "to engage in any business that will further the social or economic well-being of members of the Band:' and

the Tribal Governing Board believes it is in the best interest of employees of the Gaming Enterprises to receive adequate holiday pay and as an incentive for employees to work at Gaming Enterprises during a holiday.
that the Tribal Governing Board hereby adopts and amends the following Holiday Pay policy as follows:
